deals.description: Through 4/29, this Vera Bradley Campus Backpack drops from $109 to $49.05 to $34.34 in two colors when you add it to your cart at VeraBradley.com. Plus shipping is free. This is the lowest price we could find by $11. It is available in Sierra Stream at this price and features two zip pockets, and a padded back panel. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Vera Bradley
deals.title: Vera Bradley Campus Backpack $34 Shipped

deals.description: Get up to 38% off sale styles, then take an extra 40% off when you use the code ENJOY during checkout at Quiksilver. Shipping is free on orders over $29, otherwise it adds $3.99. The promotion includes this Everyday Eddie Aikau Windbreaker Jacket, which listed at $55 and was on sale for $33.99. It falls to $20.39 with the code. This Revival Leather Belt falls from $36.99 to $22.99 to $13.79, and you can get this Night Track Backpack for $13.19. These are the best prices we can find anywhere. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.title: Quiksilver: Extra 40% Off Sale

deals.description: Get up to 30% off sitewide, then take an extra 25% off eBags-brand luggage when you use the code SPRING during checkout at eBags. Shipping is free on orders over $49, otherwise it starts at $5.95. The promotion includes this eBags Stash Laptop Backpack, which listed at $59.99. It was already on sale for $39.99, and it falls to $27.99 with the code. This eBags Fortis 22" Hardside Spinner Carry-On drops from $199.99 to $179.99 to $134.99. There are many options to choose from. Sales tax is charged in some states.
deals.title: eBags: Up to 30% Off + 25% Off Luggage

deals.description: This eBags eTech 2.0 Weekender Convertible Junior listed at $90, but you can get it for $52.49 when you use the code SPRING during checkout at eBags. Shipping is free, and that's the best price we can find anywhere. This bag has contoured backpack straps and a padded back panel, so you can carry it on your back. It also has top and side handles for luggage-style transport. The 19" x 13.75" x 9"size suits most airline carry-on requirements. Choose Rose or Plum colors while supplies last. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.title: eBags Weekender Carry-On Bag $53 Shipped

deals.description: The Dad On Diaper Duty(D.O.D.D.) XH Backpack with Badges in Camo, Khaki or Black drops from $129.95 to $99.99 with free shipping at Tactical Dad. This is the best price we could find for one of these combat-ready diaper bags by $30. They're made with 600 Denier polyester so they'll be able to withstand a lot of abuse and feature insulated bottle holders, multiple zipped compartments, and adjustable shoulder-, sternum- and waist-straps. Three badges and a diaper pad are also included. Note: Military personal can take an additional 10% off by entering their branch and military ID number in the order notes while in the cart. There is no sales tax (Except CA).
deals.go_link: Go to Tactical Dad
deals.title: Tactical Dad Diaper Backpack $100 Shipped

deals.description: For a limited time, take up to 40% off sale sandals at Teva.com. Plus shipping is free. Some best bets are the pictured women's Original Sandal Backpack Sandals, which drop from $65 to $39, a savings of 40%, and these men's Original Universal Sport Sandals, which drop from $40 to $24, a savings of 40%. Also check out these men's Terra-Float Slide Sandals, which fall from $95 to $66, a savings of 30%. Sales tax is not charged in most states.
deals.title: Teva: Up to 40% Off + Free Shipping

deals.description: Originally $30, this Eddie Bauer Stowaway Packable Daypack from $21.43 to $12.86 when you apply code FAMILY40 at checkout at EddieBauer.com. This is a 57% discount on this popular backpack. It's available in six colors. It offers 20 liters of cargo storage along with two exterior zip pockets and two side mesh pockets. Shipping adds $7.99. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to Eddie Bauer
deals.title: Eddie Bauer Stowaway Daypack $13

deals.description: Get up to 30% off men's and women's sale styles, then take an extra 40% off when you use the code ENJOY during checkout at DC Shoes. Shipping is free on orders over $29, otherwise it starts at $3.99. The promotion includes these men's Evan Smith Shoes, which listed at $60 and were on sale for $45.99. They fall to $27.59 with the code. These women's Danni XE Shoes fall from $65 to $52.99 to $31.79 and this Trekker 24L Backpack drops to $19.91 with the code. These are the best prices we can find anywhere. Note: Only select colors and styles are on sale, and the code only works on sale items. Sales tax is charged in most states.
deals.go_link: Go to DC Shoes
deals.title: DC Shoes: Extra 40% Off Sale

deals.description: This Outer Style Trail Runner Rucksack Backpack drops from $69 to $17.99 with our exclusive coupon code BRADSRUCK18 during checkout at Outer Style. Plus it ships for free as well. This is the best price we could find by at least $9. It features a drawstring and magnetic top closure, with several pockets for versatility, and it is made from 600D polyester. You can choose from five colors. There is no sales tax (except CA).
deals.go_link: Go to Outer Style
deals.title: Outer Style Rucksack $18 Shipped

deals.description: Update! The New Hampshire Rope Tote is no longer available. Get the pictured Mayden Backpack, which drops from $89 to $44.50 to $34.50 when you enter the code t4ct4c at checkout at US Polo Association. Shipping is free when you enter the code ONLINE at checkout. A savings of 61%, and the lowest price we've seen online. This canvas tote features interior pockets, wide rope handles, and a zip top closure. Find other totes and wallets starting at $19.50. There is no sales tax (except NY and LA).
deals.go_link: Go to US Polo Association
deals.title: US Polo Handbags $10 Off + Wallets $5 Off
